body_html: If you build from sources you can use both cudnnv5 and cuda compute 3.0. We only build pips for the latest official cudnn (v4), and the nightly pip packages now are built with 3.0 support.
body_text: If you build from sources you can use both cudnnv5 and cuda compute 3.0.  We only build pips for the latest official cudnn (v4), and the nightly pip packages now are built with 3.0 support.
body: If you build from sources you can use both cudnnv5 and cuda compute 3.0.  We only build pips for the latest official cudnn (v4), and the nightly pip packages now are built with 3.0 support.
